ModulePrefs.title: LoopTV
ModulePrefs.description: Loop TV | Music and Video streaming content for your business
ModulePrefs.author: RevelDigital

Module.Content:
<style type="text/css">
body *
{
  line-height: 1.2em; 
  letter-spacing: 0; 
  word-spacing: normal;
}

body
{
  background: transparent;
  width: __UP_rdW__px;
  height: __UP_rdH__px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

#container
{
  width: __UP_rdW__px;
  height: __UP_rdH__px;
  border: 0;
}
</style>

<iframe id="container" frameborder="0" hspace="0" vspace="0" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0" allow="microphone; camera"></iframe>

<script type="text/javascript">

  var prefs = new gadgets.Prefs();
  
  var url = prefs.getString('channel');
  
  function load() {
    $('#container').attr('src', url);
  }

  gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(load);
  
  
  window.addEventListener("message", receiveMessage, false);

  function receiveMessage(event) {
	  Client.callback(event.data);
  }

</script>
